title: Hatha Yoga
description: Hatha Yoga is a traditional form of yoga that focuses on physical postures, breathing techniques, and meditation. This class is suitable for all levels, from beginners to advanced practitioners. Join us to improve your flexibility, strength, and overall well-being.

title: Vinyasa Flow
description: Vinyasa Flow is a dynamic style of yoga that synchronizes movement with breath. In this class, we will flow through a sequence of poses to build strength, improve flexibility, and promote mindfulness. All levels are welcome to join.

title: Meditation 101
description: Meditation 101 is an introductory class designed to teach the basics of meditation. Learn various techniques to calm the mind, increase self-awareness, and reduce stress. No prior experience is required. Join us to embark on a journey of self-discovery and inner peace.

title: Kundalini Yoga
description: Kundalini Yoga is a spiritual practice that combines dynamic movements, breathwork, meditation, and chanting. This class aims to awaken the dormant spiritual energy within you and promote physical and mental well-being. Open to all levels of experience.

title: Yin Yoga
description: Yin Yoga is a slow-paced practice that involves holding seated or lying postures for an extended period. This gentle and introspective class targets the deep connective tissues and promotes relaxation, flexibility, and mindfulness. Suitable for all levels.

title: Mindfulness Meditation
description: Mindfulness Meditation is a practice of cultivating present-moment awareness and non-judgmental acceptance. In this class, you will learn various mindfulness techniques to reduce stress, enhance focus, and foster overall well-being. Beginners are welcome.

title: Power Yoga
description: Power Yoga is an energizing and challenging style that combines strength, flexibility, and breath control. This dynamic class focuses on flowing sequences and invigorating poses to build stamina, tone muscles, and promote mental clarity. Suitable for intermediate to advanced practitioners.

title: Restorative Yoga
description: Restorative Yoga is a gentle and nurturing practice that emphasizes relaxation and deep rest. Through supported poses and the use of props, this class helps release tension, reduce stress, and restore balance to the body and mind. All levels are welcome.

title: Yoga Nidra
description: Yoga Nidra, also known as yogic sleep, is a guided meditation technique that induces deep relaxation and inner awareness. In this class, you will be guided through a systematic journey of consciousness, allowing for profound relaxation, rejuvenation, and self-exploration. Suitable for all levels.
